document.text:
From: EIMII
> 
To: 
BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Cc: Christian Everdell 
Subject: Re: [EXTERNAL] URGENT: Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509 
Date: Fri, 29 Oct 2021 16:38:40 +0000 
There was mail picked up today. 
>>> BOBBI C STERNHEIM 10/29/2021 11:50 AM >» 
Further my earlier email today, as of 10:30 a.m., USPO tracking lists 
the following 4 items of legal mail 
"Available for Pickup" and does not indicate that MDC has retrieved or 
received them. 
Ms. Maxwell has not received legal mail in more than a week. 
Please confirm IMMEDIATELY the status of these items on your end. 
Failure to response today will result in the filing of an order to show 
cause requiring your presence in 
Court. 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
New York, NY 10007 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim that may be confidential and/or 
privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, 
distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the 
sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message. Thank 
you. 
> --
> Isabel Maxwell, Paralegal, Leah Saffian, Inc. 
> LAW OFFICES OF LEAH SAFFIAN• LEAH SAFFIAN BA JD LLM 
LOS ANGELES, CA 
90025, USA 
EFTA00023458

> NOTICE: The information transmitted by this email is intended only 
for the person or entity to which it is addressed. This email may 
contain proprietary, business-confidential and/or legally privileged 
material. If you are not the intended recipient of this message, be 
aware that any use, review, retransmission, distribution, reproduction 
or any action taken in reliance upon this message is strictly 
prohibited. If you received this in error, lease contact the sender 
Isabel Maxwell at Te d delete the material from all 
computers. 
EFTA00023459
